title: Gamification Design to Improve Participation in Online Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary engineering mathematics knowledge (linear algebra, calculus, etc.)
context.additional_context: For in-service professionals, conducted in a summative assessment-centered environment where mathematics is applied during project execution with provided digital devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% participation in weekly projects in a leaderboard-based gamification environment
Learners demonstrate over 80% active participation in online platform interactions (discussions, feedback) during PBL task performance
Learners achieve over 75% goal attainment based on scores acquired in a gamification assessment system

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) integrated leaderboard feature

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
